_sText:
Sunny Escape is a Prison made from Mars. 
Unlike many maps you can escape from Prison using the main gate.
Once outside you can go to the powerplant to turn off the power, Go to gun shop or go to a food shop. 

Map was made for the VersonoGaming.com servers, But anyone can use it. Full credit goes to the original mars authors. This is also my first release.

Please report any bugs.
Map also contains a few secrets.

Also would like to say that this map was inspired by summer prison, Made by tom green. 
Enjoy.

Thanks.

Quick fix, Changed a secret room and fixed some letters.

Updated
Now has a bus that moves thanks to SimP-PgM and darkvininjavin. Also has a hidden room with music. Also removed the annoying walking in power room and added a wall that breaks in a cell. The cell that has it joins a cell with gun from a cell that doesnt. Also made few changes from last version.

Please leave feedback if you use it.
